name: compute-instances-list
text: What compute instances am I running in the last 5 days, and do they have any labels that might indicate what they are for?
query:
SELECT
  COALESCE(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.resource_name'),
           JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.name'),
           JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.id'),
           'unknown') AS instance_resource,
  project.id AS project_id,
  service.description AS service_description,
  LOWER(sku.description) AS sku_description,
  TO_JSON_STRING(labels) AS labels_json,
  MIN(usage_start_time) AS first_seen,
  MAX(usage_end_time) AS last_seen,
  ROUND(SUM(cost), 2) AS total_cost_5d
FROM `chip_billing.gcp_billing_export_resource_v1_01D01E_9B88C7_8078BC`
WHERE cost > 0
  AND usage_start_time >= TIMESTAMP_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
  AND (LOWER(sku.description) LIKE '%instance%' OR LOWER(sku.description) LIKE '%e2%')
GROUP BY instance_resource, project_id, service_description, sku_description, labels_json
ORDER BY total_cost_5d DESC
LIMIT 100

meta.description: Show GCP billing resources with costs greater than {min_cost} in the last {lookback_days} days, filtered by SKU descriptions matching {sku_pattern_1} or {sku_pattern_2}, limited to top {max_results} results by total cost
meta.sql_template:
SELECT
  COALESCE(JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.resource_name'),
           JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.name'),
           JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(TO_JSON_STRING(resource), '$.id'),
           'unknown') AS instance_resource,
  project.id AS project_id,
  service.description AS service_description,
  LOWER(sku.description) AS sku_description,
  TO_JSON_STRING(labels) AS labels_json,
  MIN(usage_start_time) AS first_seen,
  MAX(usage_end_time) AS last_seen,
  ROUND(SUM(cost), 2) AS total_cost_5d
FROM `chip_billing.gcp_billing_export_resource_v1_01D01E_9B88C7_8078BC`
WHERE cost > ?
  AND usage_start_time >= TIMESTAMP_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL ? DAY)
  AND (LOWER(sku.description) LIKE ? OR LOWER(sku.description) LIKE ?)
GROUP BY instance_resource, project_id, service_description, sku_description, labels_json
ORDER BY total_cost_5d DESC
LIMIT ?
